app.title: HyPrism
app.downloadedUpdate: Downloaded the latest HyPrism to your Downloads folder.
app.downloadedUpdateHint: We attempted to open the file so you can install it. If it did not open, go to Downloads and run the file manually.
app.nicknameLengthError: Nickname must be between 1 and 16 characters
app.enterInstancePath: Enter the full path where you want HyPrism instances stored:
app.pathError: The path could not be used. Please check it exists and you have write permissions.
app.instanceDirUpdatedDetail:
Game instances will now be stored in:
{{dir}}

Note: The following remain in AppData:
• Java Runtime (JRE)
• Butler tool
• Cache files
• Logs
• Launcher settings
• WebView2 (EBWebView folder)

You may need to reinstall the game if switching drives.

profile.title: プロフィール
profile.displayNameHint: ゲーム内での名前 (1-16文字)。
profile.nameWarning: Hytaleには特定のニックネームパターンがあります。英数字（0-9）のみを使用し、特殊記号やスペースは避けてください（例外： '-'、 '_'）
profile.uuidWarning: 固有IDです。変更するとスキンがリセットされます！

deleteAllData.title: Delete All Data?
deleteAllData.message: This will delete all launcher data including settings, cache, and downloaded files. This action cannot be undone.

deleteInstance.title: Delete Instance?
deleteInstance.message: This will delete the {{branch}} {{version}} instance and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
